Wild Rose
programme.desc: Wild Rose: Directed by Tom Harper. With Jessie Buckley, Matt Costello, Jane Patterson, Lesley Hart. A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5117428/","name":"Wild Rose","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBkOTZlNmYtN2NjOS00YWM2LTk0MzMtOTEwMmIyNWIwMDA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MDMxNzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5117428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"muamba_eats_toast"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Full of heart","reviewBody":"The whole story was excellently portrayed. Buckley excels both vocally and portraying the problems of so many in similar positions. It has ups and downs and doesn't shy away from challenging issues nor glorify them. Julie Walters alongside Buckley was perfect also. Although their greatness on set did outshine most of the supporting cast who had a daytime cheap tv drama feel about them although this did not take to much away. Also anything involving whispering Bob Harris has to be worth seeing. A feel good romp of a film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12418,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-04-12","keywords":"singer,country music singer,train,party,release from prison","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2535701529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzMmUxM2MtMWZkYi00ZDk2LWFjN2YtMjI3ZDc1ZTVmMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzMmUxM2MtMWZkYi00ZDk2LWFjN2YtMjI3ZDc1ZTVmMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of a stint in prison, Rose-Lynn is a single mom with an ankle monitor, a curfew, and a concerned mother (Julie Walters), who wants her to focus more on her two children and less on her music. But when Rose- Lynn tries to hold down a housekeeping job, her boss (Sophie Okonedo) hears her singing and becomes an unlikely supporter, intent on getting her to Nashville despite the long odds. Caught between hope and responsibility, Rose-Lynn must find her place without abandoning her raw talent and grand ambitions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2976580/","name":"Jessie Buckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182588/","name":"Matt Costello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10712277/","name":"Jane Patterson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2197777/","name":"Tom Harper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375874/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316150/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2822756/","name":"Nicole Taylor"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

A feel good romp of a film.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12418,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-04-12","keywords":"singer,country music singer,train,party,release from prison","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2535701529","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzMmUxM2MtMWZkYi00ZDk2LWFjN2YtMjI3ZDc1ZTVmMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzMmUxM2MtMWZkYi00ZDk2LWFjN2YtMjI3ZDc1ZTVmMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of a stint in prison, Rose-Lynn is a single mom with an ankle monitor, a curfew, and a concerned mother (Julie Walters), who wants her to focus more on her two children and less on her music. programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
Exodus: Bogowie i królowie
Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: Exodus: Gods and Kings: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Christian Bale, Joel Edgerton, John Turturro, Aaron Paul. The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1528100/","name":"Exodus: Gods and Kings","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI3MDY0NjkxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM3NTA0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1528100/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ggallegosgroupuk"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darling! Moses is on the phone....","reviewBody":"What, in God's name, was this? Everything reeks of commercial operation without any real thought behind it. Of all the puzzling elements in this bizarre epic, the most inexplicable is Christian Bale as Moses. Not the choice of Christian Bale - commercial operation, remember - no, that I understand, what's inexplicable is his performance. We know now Christian Bale is a great actor. Great. The Fighter alone puts him right up there with some of the best of his generation so why then he's so bad, but so bad here. His Moses is absent. Not a moment of truth, not a moment of real connection. Was he a hostage, performing against his will? That's what I felt, that he didn't want to be there and that alone made me watch the whole film with disdain. What a disheartening experience. I give it a 2 and not a 1 out of respect for the crew, because their work is real and present on the screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163364,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"(Banned)","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-31","keywords":"moses,pharaoh,plague,egypt,exodus","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1381084953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMjc2OTc5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk3OTU1MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMjc2OTc5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk3OTU1MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The defiant leader Moses rises up against the Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses, setting 600,000 slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0249291/","name":"Joel Edgerton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0454147/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177836/","name":"Adam Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0171651/","name":"Bill Collage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128997/","name":"Jeffrey Caine"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Longest Ride
Najdłuższa podróż
The Longest Ride
programme.desc: The Longest Ride: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726560/","name":"The Longest Ride","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzIzMjg0NjQwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODAwOTE4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726560/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patsworld"},"dateCreated":"2015-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"So, There's Yet Another Eastwood Heartthrob!","reviewBody":"And I don't think it's going to take any time at all for this hunk to be completely and absolutely known only for his own looks, talent, and fame rather than having the fact that he's Clint Eastwood's son being tacked on. Scott is good! Britt Robertson was nicely cast as Sophia, except I have to admit here that I kept seeing a young Renee Zellweger in the part– before the silly plastic surgery turned her into a total stranger. Or just strange. Whatever. Jack Huston was excellent as a young Ira and I think portraying the elderly Ira is one of Alan Alda's best roles. I was just expecting the usual chick flick - but not so. Rugged enough action with the bull riding to interest any guy, as well as a decent plot and all around good acting. To sum it up, this is a nicely done film and one I wouldn't hesitate to recommend.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":79481,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2015-04-15","keywords":"usa,united states,college student,college,bull riding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2592911641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man as he reflects back on a lost love while he's trapped in an automobile crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207222/","name":"Scott Eastwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429380/","name":"Britt Robertson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000257/","name":"Alan Alda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0863387/","name":"George Tillman Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081189/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817023/","name":"Nicholas Sparks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093271/","name":"Craig Bolotin"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Trzy i pół godziny
programme.desc: Monachium, 13 sierpnia 1961 roku. Pasażerowie pociągu do Berlina Wschodniego dowiadują się o budowie muru dzielącego miasto. Do granicy dotrą za trzy i pół godziny. W tym czasie muszą podjąć decyzję, czy wysiąść, czy jechać dalej. Przed trudnym wyborem staje m.in. Marlis podróżująca z mężem Gerdem i dzieckiem.

programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
Miłość, ślub i inne nieszczęścia
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
programme.desc:
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Maggie Grace, Diane Keaton, Jeremy Irons, Dennis Dugan. It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10235718/","name":"Love, Weddings & Other Disasters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA5NzRjMDktMzc0My00NDdkLThlN2YtNDZiYjM3MGVkY2M4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10235718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ts-0000"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why the hate?","reviewBody":"Was it perfect? Lol-Not at all.

However did have overall parts,that made it watchable.

Casting was decent,most of the storylines & cinematography too."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1451,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"couple","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4041982233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maggie Grace (Taken) and Oscar® winners Diane Keaton and Jeremy Irons lead this warmhearted romantic comedy. With a couple’s impending wedding as the backdrop, Love, Weddings & Other Disasters weaves multiple storylines as it follows the search for love by a colorful group of characters including: an inexperienced wedding planner (Grace) nicknamed “The Wedding Trasher”; a fussy celebrity caterer (Irons); his blind date (Keaton); and a tour-bus guide (Andrew Bachelor) looking for his Cinderella. How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

A commitment-phobic 27 year old's relationship is put to the test when she and her new boyfriend go to 7 weddings in the same year." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8367184/","name":"The Wedding Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGU0ZDAxNjYtMTFlMi00MzY5LThhYmUtYWM5MTY1ODVmZTNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI2ODA4MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A commitment-phobic 27 year old's relationship is put to the test when she and her new boyfriend go to 7 weddings in the same year.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8367184/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really fun and enjoyable","reviewBody":"This film tells the story of a new couple who goes to seven weddings in a year.\n\nThe film is just so sweet and fun! programme.title: Berlin, I Love You
Zakochany Berlin
Berlin, I Love You
programme.desc: Berlin, I Love You: Directed by Dianna Agron, Peter Chelsom, Claus Clausen, Fernando Eimbcke, Justin Franklin, Dennis Gansel, Dani Levy, Daniel Lwowski, Stephanie Martin, Josef Rusnak, Til Schweiger, Massy Tadjedin, Gabriela Tscherniak. With Keira Knightley, Helen Mirren, Luke Wilson, Jim Sturgess. Latest installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature film is made of ten stories of romance set in the German capital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2275743/","name":"Berlin, I Love You","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIwMTNlZmYtZGIxZS00MzAyLWI5MWMtYzg3YWNiNzg5YTI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Latest installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature film is made of ten stories of romance set in the German capital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2275743/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's horrid","reviewBody":"This film is a collage of segments of people whose lives intersect in Berlin.\n\nWith this many big names, it is a surprise that the film is allowed to be a horrid mess. Just the first segment alone is enough to make me lose interest in the whole film. It is a bizarre short about a man and a GPS system, and it is just way too strange to be likable. The subsequent segments get no better, not even the one with Helen Mirren and Keira Knightley. The Berlin protrayed in the film is an unattractive dump, and it does not inspire any romantic feelings. Fortunately, there is one segment that is good, which is the puppet show one. It gives warmth and radiates attraction, which is the only segment that sticks to romantic love in Berlin."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2919,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-08-08","keywords":"portmanteau film,directed by several directors,punctuation in title,city name in title,female nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Berlin, I Love You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3909401113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1NTgxM2MtZDAzYi00ZDVkLTk5MjItMGM5NzAwZmRmOGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1NTgxM2MtZDAzYi00ZDVkLTk5MjItMGM5NzAwZmRmOGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005561/","name":"Luke Wilson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1872698/","name":"Dianna Agron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155093/","name":"Peter Chelsom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1313447/","name":"Claus Clausen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0671138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174940/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0228761/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251774/","name":"Fernando Eimbcke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3418586/","name":"Justin Franklin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304541/","name":"Dennis Gansel"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stealing Harvard
Pianista
The Pianist
programme.desc: Stealing Harvard: Directed by Bruce McCulloch. With Jason Lee, Tom Green, Leslie Mann, Megan Mullally. A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0265808/","name":"Stealing Harvard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZhMGIyNGMtN2NmYy00OTBhLWE3NWQtMGQ3ZmNmZGUwMDg1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0265808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"a silly comedy that works","reviewBody":"Call me crazy, but I liked this movie. It had its moments. I especially liked Elaine's dad; his character was the funniest. The part where John and Mr. Warner end up in drag at the judge's house was so funny. Then the end was great when John writes I have the picture, and the judge lets him off. And all the silly ideas John and Duff come up with to get the money were quite entertaining. I liked the fact that for once, Tom Green didn't play a gross out character.\n\nFINAL VERDICT: This is a comedy worth seeing. It's only about 80 minutes long, but that's about right for a Tom Green movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2002-09-13","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,harvard,black comedy,crying during sex,voice over narration","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealing Harvard","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4237989913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMmYwNTQtYWM2Ni00NWM2LWJmODMtY2ZkNWE3OWJhZTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Stealing Harvard"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005134/","name":"Jason Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338381/","name":"Tom Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005182/","name":"Leslie Mann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567126/","name":"Bruce McCulloch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405271/","name":"Martin Hynes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865847/","name":"Peter Tolan"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

W spirali
programme.desc: W spirali: Directed by Konrad Aksinowicz. With Piotr Stramowski, Katarzyna Warnke, Olga Boladz, Antoni Królikowski. An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. Tamir is a witness to, and a catalyst of their problems, a self-appointed healer wishing to become their path to enlightenment. Krzysztof and Agnes know they shouldn't be together but they are unable to part, or perhaps they do not want to? "Into the Spiral" is a story of love which is restless, dangerous and toxic." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4092514/","name":"W spirali","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY3M2NjNWMtNzY3MC00NGY3LWJiNTMtMWEyZTBmZjc4OGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY0OTk2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An out of town car trip, which was meant to have a purifying effect on the trouble-stricken married couple, turns into a dangerous interaction between characters when they pick up an eccentric traveler, Tamir. programme.title: Wino truskawkowe
Wino truskawkowe
programme.desc: Wino truskawkowe: Directed by Dariusz Jablonski. With Jirí Machácek, Zuzana Fialová, Marian Dziedziel, Mieczyslaw Grabka. This is not a love story though it is full of love. It is not a comedy though the characters often say funny things. It is not a detective story even though the hero is trying to solve a murder. It is not a nature drama though it shows the splendid colours and customs of the countryside. It is not a musical though Lubica expresses her longing in a passionate dance. Nor is it a film about ghosts though a ghost does ask the hero for a favour. A few draughts of Strawberry Wine are enough to take us into a magical world in the true centre of Europe, where love, crime and penitence are just as much a part of life as the changing of the seasons, the migration of birds or the flowing of a mountain stream." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1260596/","name":"Wino truskawkowe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTI5MjU4YjUtNGJkNy00Nzk2LTgyYWEtMDk0OTBmY2NmZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTgyNDg0NTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is not a love story though it is full of love. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
Exodus: Bogowie i królowie
Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: Exodus: Gods and Kings: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Christian Bale, Joel Edgerton, John Turturro, Aaron Paul. The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1528100/","name":"Exodus: Gods and Kings","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI3MDY0NjkxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM3NTA0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1528100/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ggallegosgroupuk"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darling! Moses is on the phone....","reviewBody":"What, in God's name, was this? Everything reeks of commercial operation without any real thought behind it. Of all the puzzling elements in this bizarre epic, the most inexplicable is Christian Bale as Moses. Not the choice of Christian Bale - commercial operation, remember - no, that I understand, what's inexplicable is his performance. We know now Christian Bale is a great actor. Great. The Fighter alone puts him right up there with some of the best of his generation so why then he's so bad, but so bad here. His Moses is absent. Not a moment of truth, not a moment of real connection. Was he a hostage, performing against his will? That's what I felt, that he didn't want to be there and that alone made me watch the whole film with disdain. What a disheartening experience. I give it a 2 and not a 1 out of respect for the crew, because their work is real and present on the screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163364,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"(Banned)","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-31","keywords":"moses,pharaoh,plague,egypt,exodus","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1381084953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMjc2OTc5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk3OTU1MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMjc2OTc5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk3OTU1MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The defiant leader Moses rises up against the Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses, setting 600,000 slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0249291/","name":"Joel Edgerton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0454147/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177836/","name":"Adam Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0171651/","name":"Bill Collage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128997/","name":"Jeffrey Caine"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock: mistrz suspensu
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock był wybitnym angielskim reżyserem, który żył w latach 1899-1980. Stworzył on takie filmy jak "Psychoza" czy "Okno na podwórze". Twórcy dokumentu przybliżają kulisy pracy "mistrza suspensu", pokazują, jak wyglądała jego kariera oraz relacje z najbliższymi. Używają do tego m.in. archiwalnych materiałów.

programme.title: The Last Vermeer

Lyrebird
programme.desc:
The Last Vermeer: Directed by Dan Friedkin. With Guy Pearce, Claes Bang, Vicky Krieps, Roland Møller. An artist is suspected of selling a valuable painting to the Nazis, but there is more to the story than meets the eye." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8337320/","name":"The Last Vermeer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWE1NzcyOGYtMmY4Zi00NTA3LWE0OGQtM2RlNGI4Y2JlZTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An artist is suspected of selling a valuable painting to the Nazis, but there is more to the story than meets the eye.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8337320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"celt007"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pearce is fantastic","reviewBody":"Interesting and intriguing story of post ww2 society in Holland .

Great acting but Pearce and others . Directed and beautifully filmed .

If you like historical dramas I would recommend this movie .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-20","keywords":"one word title,world war two,nazi,painter,art","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3152527641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmVmNWY0OGUtOGE4ZS00OWZkLTllNGItMDk3YmI4Zjg1MTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmVmNWY0OGUtOGE4ZS00OWZkLTllNGItMDk3YmI4Zjg1MTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Joseph Piller (Bang), a Dutch Jew, was fighting in the Resistance during the Second World War, the witty, debonair aesthete, Han van Meegeren (Pearce) was hosting hedonistic soirées and selling Dutch art treasures to Hermann Goring and other top Nazis. Following the war, Piller becomes an investigator assigned the task of identifying and redistributing stolen art, resulting in the flamboyant van Meegeren being accused of collaboration - a crime punishable by death. But, despite mounting evidence, Piller, with the aid of his assistant (Krieps), becomes increasingly convinced of Han's innocence and finds himself in the unlikely position of fighting to save his life."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051903/","name":"Claes Bang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3043279/","name":"Vicky Krieps"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6679051/","name":"Dan Friedkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0473978/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0241129/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0650089/","name":"John Orloff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1318843/","name":"Mark Fergus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319757/","name":"Hawk Ostby"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Glorias
Gloria Steinem. Moje życie w drodze
The Glorias
programme.desc:
The Glorias: Directed by Julie Taymor. With Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Lulu Wilson. The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7435316/","name":"The Glorias","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE1ZDI3MTgtODNmZi00OTQyLTkyYjMtNzI3OTRhOWEwY2NjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODc0OTEyNDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7435316/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnobReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Expected much more.","reviewBody":"Unfocused but well acted; "The Glorias" pays homage to a feminist icon with a talented cast but the final product is far from being iconic.

In this drama, feminist icon Gloria Steinem recounts her itinerant childhood's influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide. Based on a true story.

I can appreciate director Julie Taymor's vision (except for that "Wizard Of Oz" sequence, which was a bit much), but "The Glorias" leans more on the messy side rather than being wholly empowering. However the cast is great; Julianne Moore is terrific, Alicia Vikander delivers a solid performance, but Bette Midler is the scene stealer and kicks serious ass in her role. An inspiring and interesting story but overly long and uneven.

Follow @snobmedia for more reviews!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-09-30","keywords":"feminism,activism,journalism,based on book,based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi162185497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNiZTdkOTMtNTk5Mi00OWNhLWEwMjgtNDljNmU5OTM5ZWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNiZTdkOTMtNTk5Mi00OWNhLWEwMjgtNDljNmU5OTM5ZWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Journalist, fighter, and feminist Gloria Steinem is an indelible icon known for her world-shaping activism, guidance of the revolutionary women's movement, and writing that has impacted generations. In this nontraditional biopic, Julie Taymor crafts a complex tapestry of one of the most inspirational and legendary figures of modern history, based on Steinem's own memoir My Life on the Road."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1847117/","name":"Janelle Monáe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853380/","name":"Julie Taymor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0436784/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0706288/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0718129/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853380/","name":"Julie Taymor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3951729/","name":"Sarah Ruhl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0825887/","name":"Gloria Steinem"}],"duration":"PT2H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Silk Road
Wirtualne imperium
Silk Road
programme.desc:
Silk Road: Directed by Tiller Russell. With Nick Robinson, Jennifer Yun, Jimmi Simpson, Jason Clarke. Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7937254/","name":"Silk Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM0NzMyMjUtYTE0ZS00YWNhLWFjMTItZTAwYWJkOGI5MGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7937254/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fciocca"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"How such an interesting and fascinating story could be made so boring?","reviewBody":"What the director and screenwriters did not understood is that Silk Road was at the time a big revolution: drugs that were always bought with physical cash transactions, with all risks for being caught on the spot by the police, finally moved to the hidden web, guaranteeing anonymous purchases from all around the world and having them delivered directly at home. The market became so important, that the website started to sell also other kind of products, and this in a little over two years, which is impressive. Nothing of this is portrayed in the movie, which focuses too much on things that does not matter at all. Why giving so much attention to Ulbricht and his girlfriend? Why giving so much space to Bowden? Everything is rushed to a point where certain part of the story are completely skipped: how the founder passed to sell just drugs, to also weapons and fake documents? We don't get to know.

Ulbricht is portrayed just like a clueless guy, that does not have any idea on how to handle his activity, which maybe was partially true, but let me tell you that a guy that he is able to build from the ground up a marketplace so big and important, is not for sure dumb. In fact he finished university and he obtained even a master. Why you did not show the craft of the website? How he came up with the name Silk Road? How he grew his business, which strategies he used? None of this apparently matter on the eyes of creators. We see instead a DEA agent that was transferred to the cybercrimes department, because he completely suck at his job and need just to work a few months to get the pension. We see him hanging around with his informant, that does most of the job that he is supposed to do. Absolutely ridiculous. Moreover is the classic cop that he is not able to understand that time changes and the job is different now, so he is basically the typical boomer, not able to accept having a younger boss, more experienced than him in IT, and he claims that the old way is always the best one. So cliché.

If you really want to make a movie about Silk Road, you should first of all really inform yourself, reading books and watching documentaries about the topic, making tons of research; understanding how this single website changed society, which were the consequences when was shut down and what inspired afterwards. The movie is incomplete, and made by people that clearly did not know anything about it. If you really want to know the true story, please go to watch "Deep Web", as it really explain what happened.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-02-19","keywords":"business,drugs,dark net","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi946258201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMzYzY1ZTQtZjc3Mi00MWU4LTg1NjQtYmFhMWE3MTIyNGU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMzYzY1ZTQtZjc3Mi00MWU4LTg1NjQtYmFhMWE3MTIyNGU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by larger-than-life actual events, this riveting crime thriller follows the rise and fall of Silk Road, the infamous darknet site that sent a seismic shock through the World Wide Web. Young, idealistic, and driven to succeed, Ross Ulbricht (Nick Robinson) creates the internet’s first unregulated marketplace: Silk Road. But when it becomes a multimillion-dollar pipeline for illicit drugs, Ross is set on a collision course with Rick Bowden (Jason Clarke), a disreputable and dangerously unpredictable DEA agent, who will use any means necessary to take him down."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3538718/","name":"Nick Robinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6066464/","name":"Jennifer Yun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0801051/","name":"Jimmi Simpson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0243819/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731972/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6365846/","name":"David Kushner"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Nick Robinson (role=Ross Ulbricht), Jennifer Yun (role=Kim Yum (FBI)), Jimmi Simpson (role=Chris Tarbell), Jason Clarke (role=Rick Bowden), Paul Blott (role=Liquor Store Clerk), Darrell Britt-Gibson (role=Rayford), Daniel David Stewart (role=Max), Kenneth Miller (role=H.T. Palmer), Alexandra Shipp (role=Julia), Katie Aselton (role=Sandy), Lexi Rabe (role=Edie), David DeLao (role=Johnny Morales)

IMDb data; ttnr: 7937254, Title: Silk Road, --- Description: Silk Road: Directed by Tiller Russell. With Nick Robinson, Jennifer Yun, Jimmi Simpson, Jason Clarke. Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7937254/","name":"Silk Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM0NzMyMjUtYTE0ZS00YWNhLWFjMTItZTAwYWJkOGI5MGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7937254/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"fciocca","dateCreated":"2021-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"How such an interesting and fascinating story could be made so boring?","reviewBody":"What the director and screenwriters did not understood is that Silk Road was at the time a big revolution: drugs that were always bought with physical cash transactions, with all risks for being caught on the spot by the police, finally moved to the hidden web, guaranteeing anonymous purchases from all around the world and having them delivered directly at home. The market became so important, that the website started to sell also other kind of products, and this in a little over two years, which is impressive. Nothing of this is portrayed in the movie, which focuses too much on things that does not matter at all. Why giving so much attention to Ulbricht and his girlfriend? Why giving so much space to Bowden? Everything is rushed to a point where certain part of the story are completely skipped: how the founder passed to sell just drugs, to also weapons and fake documents? We don't get to know.

Ulbricht is portrayed just like a clueless guy, that does not have any idea on how to handle his activity, which maybe was partially true, but let me tell you that a guy that he is able to build from the ground up a marketplace so big and important, is not for sure dumb. In fact he finished university and he obtained even a master. Why you did not show the craft of the website? How he came up with the name Silk Road? How he grew his business, which strategies he used? None of this apparently matter on the eyes of creators. We see instead a DEA agent that was transferred to the cybercrimes department, because he completely suck at his job and need just to work a few months to get the pension. We see him hanging around with his informant, that does most of the job that he is supposed to do. Absolutely ridiculous. Moreover is the classic cop that he is not able to understand that time changes and the job is different now, so he is basically the typical boomer, not able to accept having a younger boss, more experienced than him in IT, and he claims that the old way is always the best one. So cliché.

If you really want to make a movie about Silk Road, you should first of all really inform yourself, reading books and watching documentaries about the topic, making tons of research; understanding how this single website changed society, which were the consequences when was shut down and what inspired afterwards. The movie is incomplete, and made by people that clearly did not know anything about it. If you really want to know the true story, please go to watch "Deep Web", as it really explain what happened.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-02-19","keywords":"business,drugs,dark net","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi946258201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMzYzY1ZTQtZjc3Mi00MWU4LTg1NjQtYmFhMWE3MTIyNGU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMzYzY1ZTQtZjc3Mi00MWU4LTg1NjQtYmFhMWE3MTIyNGU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by larger-than-life actual events, this riveting crime thriller follows the rise and fall of Silk Road, the infamous darknet site that sent a seismic shock through the World Wide Web. Young, idealistic, and driven to succeed, Ross Ulbricht (Nick Robinson) creates the internet’s first unregulated marketplace: Silk Road. But when it becomes a multimillion-dollar pipeline for illicit drugs, Ross is set on a collision course with Rick Bowden (Jason Clarke), a disreputable and dangerously unpredictable DEA agent, who will use any means necessary to take him down.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3538718/","name":"Nick Robinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6066464/","name":"Jennifer Yun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0801051/","name":"Jimmi Simpson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0243819/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731972/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183164/","name":"Tiller Russell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6365846/","name":"David Kushner"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Humans
Life
programme.desc:
Humans: With Katherine Parkinson, Gemma Chan, Lucy Carless, Tom Goodman-Hill. In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human - is transforming the way we live." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4122068/","name":"Humans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NjE2OTY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE0NDc0ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human - is transforming the way we live.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4122068/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nicolasrowley"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Condition of Humans","reviewBody":"My wife and I operate a three episode policy when deciding to watch a new show. With all the great TV out there it can be hard to choose what to watch and not every show has a great start but develops into something memorable. As a result we always wait until we have DVR'd at least three episodes before watching the first. The other reason we record three is if the show is good we will want more immediately. Humans however left us wanting more after the third episode.

The concepts in this show are not ground breaking for any fan of the genre or any reader of science fiction but the fact it is set in the present day in a very relatable parallel reality (especially for Brits) is where this series gets its mojo. This is a thinking persons show the story is secondary to the compelling analysis of human nature and it's reactions to technology. Those who embrace it, those who reject it both are catered for here.

The production values are so very high and the casting is exemplary. Most people are not well known with the exception of William Hurt but there are familiar faces (again, especially for Brits) in there.

This show is not all action but is guaranteed to thrill you and chill you with it's moody pacing, moments of comedy and disturbing critique of humanity facing the very nature of its own creation.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37776,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-06-14","keywords":"based on tv series,female protagonist,british science fiction,robot,humanoid","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1817670/","name":"Katherine Parkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110418/","name":"Gemma Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6845331/","name":"Lucy Carless"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110977/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0318834/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2429007385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMzY2ODkxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI5MzE4MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMzY2ODkxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI5MzE4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human it's transforming the way we live."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kiler
Kiler
programme.desc: Kiler: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Jerzy Stuhr, Janusz Rewinski. An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0127626/","name":"Kiler","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNWMxYWEtODUwMC00ZDRjLWI0MmQtMjFjNTFiMDYwZDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0127626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cjpok"},"dateCreated":"1999-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of action with funny twists","reviewBody":"This could easily be called the Polish version of "Pulp Fiction" but thank God, it is not. It is captivating from the very get-go, keeping the viewing audience as hostage to the very end. Although unique in style and approach, it is universal and could appeal to any audience, anywhere in the world. Humorous and tastefully prepared.No wonder Hollywood already bought rights to the story. We may see it on this side of the pond. I hope without Bruce Willis or other Hollywood screen "heroes". This story deserves better!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6505,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1997-11-17","keywords":"character name as title,serial murder,surname as title,one word title,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668640/","name":"Cezary Pazura"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469021/","name":"Malgorzata Kozuchowska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836136/","name":"Jerzy Stuhr"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0921264/","name":"Piotr Weresniak"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa
Kochankowie roku tygrysa
programme.desc:
Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Michal Zebrowski (role=Wolski), Li Min (role=Song), Sun Ji Feng (role=Guo), Wu Fen Xia (role=Guo Da Ma), Norbert Rakowski (role=Stankiewicz), Irena Slawinska (role=Old Woman from the Village)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0484051, Title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa, --- Description: Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6","dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2,"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej 5
programme.desc: Marieta Marecka prezentuje jak w prosty i przystępny sposób przygotować pożywny obiad dla całej rodziny. Prowadząca udzieli także kilku wskazówek dotyczących tego, co i za ile kupić, jakie składnik można zastąpić tańszymi zamiennikami oraz jak robić przemyślane zakupy. W programie pojawią się także ciekawe pomysły na: lunch do pracy, dania jednogarnkowe, kolację dla przyjaciół oraz przepisy z mniej niż pięciu składników.

credits.actor: Ringo Starr, Michael Angelis, George Carlin, Alec Baldwin, Michael Brandon, Ben Small, Kerry Shale, Martin Sherman, Matt Wilkinson
Ringo Starr, Michael Angelis, George Carlin, Alec Baldwin, Michael Brandon, Ben Small, Kerry Shale, Martin Sherman, Matt Wilkinson
Anna Valle, Loretta Goggi, Ana Caterina Morariu, Giorgio Marchesi, Irene Ferri, Alessio Vassallo, Leonardo Della Bianca, Aurora Giovinazzo, Niccolò Calvagna

programme.title: News+
programme.desc: Podsumowanie najważniejszych wydarzeń z aren sportowych. Omówienie sukcesów, rekordów i porażek. Program prowadzą zamiennie m.in. Piotr Karpiński, Piotr Salak, Wojciech Zawioła i Gabriel Rogaczewski.

programme.title: Wysoki Pressing
programme.desc: Prowadzony w lekkiej formule telewizji śniadaniowej program poświęcony piłce nożnej. Gospodarz wraz z gośćmi omówi najważniejsze boiskowe wydarzenia, nie zabraknie też wnikliwych analiz i gorących dyskusji. Prowadzącymi na zmianę będą Daria Kabała-Malarz i Michał Kołodziejczyk.

programme.title: Turbokozak
programme.desc: Bartosz Ignacik i Grzegorz Jędrzejewski w zabawnym teście sprawdzają umiejętności piłkarskie zawodników z Ekstraklasy. Czasem w programie pojawiają się reprezentanci innych dyscyplin i znane osoby.

programme.title: O co biega?
programme.desc: W magazynie nowinki oraz praktyczne porady dla osób, które uprawiają bieganie rekreacyjnie, półprofesjonalnie, zawodowo lub dopiero zaczynają. Gospodarz programu Marcin Rosłoń wraz z ekspertami będzie podpowiadał, jak przygotować się do biegania amatorskiego i zawodowego, jak dobrać odpowiedni sprzęt lub przygotować się do maratonu. W programie nie zabraknie również ciekawostek, rozmów ze sportowcami i osobami z show-biznesu, które opowiedzą o swojej pasji do biegania.

programme.title: Turbokozak Extra
programme.desc: Bartosz Ignacik i Grzegorz Jędrzejewski sprawdzają, jak ludzie związani z szeroko pojętym światem sportu poradzą sobie na boisku. Zaproszeni goście muszą wykonać różne piłkarskie zadania. Za ich wykonanie otrzymują punkty, które zaliczane są do klasyfikacji danego sezonu programu.

credits.actor: Karolina Kuszewska-Łukasik, Sasha Sidorenko, Sylwia Zaczkiewicz, Dominika Rembelska, Gabriela Kuzawińska, Ewa Piątkowska, Joanna Jędrzejczyk, Sylwia Kusiak, Magdalena Loska

programme.title: Zielona rewolucja Marty Dymek 2
programme.desc: Marta Dymek przeprowadza w kuchni rewolucję. Przekonuje mięsożerców do potraw wegańskich. Wśród jej gości znajdą się złoty medalista z Pekinu Piotr Małachowski i kucharki z baru mlecznego.

programme.title: ABC gotowania - kuchnia włoska
programme.desc: Sztuka kulinarna we Włoszech opiera się na prostych potrawach przygotowanych z dobrych składników. Oliwa z oliwek, warzywa i zioła, sery, ryby, owoce morza, jajka, mąka i oliwki to podstawy wielu dań.

programme.title: Jakubiak rodzinnie
programme.desc: Gotowanie jest znakomitym pretekstem do spędzania czasu z rodziną. Znany szef kuchni Tomasz Jakubiak zachęca do dzielenia się z bliskimi pysznymi daniami. Sam w programie przedstawi członków swojej rodziny: mamę, tatę, siostrę oraz narzeczoną. Wraz z nimi w każdym odcinku zaprezentuje proste pomysły na śniadanie, obiad i kolację. Nie zabraknie anegdot z życia kucharza oraz cennych wskazówek kulinarnych.

programme.title: Meblokreacje 5
programme.desc: Artur Indyka podejmuje się ciekawych wyzwań. Przedstawia świeże pomysły na stare meble i dodatki do wnętrz. Pozornie bezużyteczne przedmioty zyskują drugie życie i nowe funkcje. Ekspert zajmuje się m.in. starymi skrzyniami wojskowymi, z których powstaje designerski regał pod RTV czy dziecięcym łóżkiem, przerobionym na serwantkę. Nie brakuje też rozwiązań w duchu "zero waste", takich jak wykorzystanie plastikowych słomek jako tworzywa do ramy lustra.

programme.title: Meblokreacje 5
programme.desc: Artur Indyka podejmuje się ciekawych wyzwań. Przedstawia świeże pomysły na stare meble i dodatki do wnętrz. Pozornie bezużyteczne przedmioty zyskują drugie życie i nowe funkcje. Ekspert zajmuje się m.in. starymi skrzyniami wojskowymi, z których powstaje designerski regał pod RTV czy dziecięcym łóżkiem, przerobionym na serwantkę. Nie brakuje też rozwiązań w duchu "zero waste", takich jak wykorzystanie plastikowych słomek jako tworzywa do ramy lustra.

programme.title: Pogotowie remontowe Wieśka 4
programme.desc: Wiesiek Skiba pomaga ludziom, którzy stali się ofiarami nierzetelnych firm remontowych. Specjalista naprawi rozmaite usterki zgłoszone przez widzów. Udowodni też, że wiele drobnych remontów w kuchni, łazience, salonie czy na tarasie można zrobić samodzielnie.

programme.title: Historia największych przebojów
programme.desc: Dziesięcioodcinkowy serial dokumentalny, który przybliża okoliczności, jakie towarzyszyły powstawaniu najsłynniejszych utworów wielkich artystów muzyki popularnej. Wśród nich znajdują się Madonna, Sting, Rod Steward czy Cher.

programme.title: News+
programme.desc: Podsumowanie najważniejszych wydarzeń z aren sportowych. Omówienie sukcesów, rekordów i porażek. Program prowadzą zamiennie m.in. Piotr Karpiński, Piotr Salak, Wojciech Zawioła i Gabriel Rogaczewski.

credits.actor: Janusz Szymański, Michał Stajniak, Maciej Kaliński, Grzegorz Żaglewski, Filip Drożdż, Łukasz Przesmycki, Aleksandra Gowin, Paweł Grabiński, Jakub Wołowiec

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Frank Lammers, Hetty Heyting, Michael De Roos, Jörgen Scholtens, Anne van Lieshout, Joost Prinsen
Robert Tarango, Steven Prescod, Francisco Burgos, Alestair Shu, Javier Rodriguez, Coffey, Luis Antonio Aponte

programme.title: Zatrzymanie
Detainment
programme.desc: Twórca obrazu powraca do wstrząsającej sprawy morderstwa na 2-letnim Jamesie Bulgerze, które w 1993 roku popełnili dwaj 10-latkowie. Scenariusz bazuje na autentycznych policyjnych nagraniach z przesłuchań sprawców.

Leon Hughes

Patryk Szwichtenberg, Agata Różycka, Marek Karpowicz, Andrzej Szeremeta, Szymon Mysłakowski, Robert Talarczyk, Marek Siudym, Alicja Sajewicz, Antonina Jarnuszkiewicz

programme.title: Lifting wnętrz z Marią Semczyszyn
programme.desc: Maria Semczyszyn wraz ze swym kompanem, Wieśkiem, pomaga w błyskawicznym re-designie pokojów, których obecny wygląd z różnych powodów nie zadowala właścicieli. Zadanie nie należy do łatwych - to właściciele decydują, w jakim stylu mają być urządzone pomieszczenia. Dekoratorka musi sprostać ich oczekiwaniom, niejednokrotnie przedstawiając projekty, które kłócą się z jej własnym gustem.

programme.title: THE LEGENDS z Tomkiem Ćwiąkałą
programme.desc: Cykl wywiadów przeprowadzanych przez Tomka Ćwiąkałę z ważnymi postaciami ze świata futbolu. Wśród nich są mistrzowie świata, Europy i gwiazdy topowych lig. Widzowie dowiedzą się, czym zajmują się dzisiaj, jak wspominają swoje kariery oraz poznają ich plany na przyszłość.

programme.title: The Climb
Pod górkę
The Climb
programme.desc: The Climb: Directed by Michael Angelo Covino. With Kyle Marvin, Michael Angelo Covino, Gayle Rankin, Talia Balsam. A look at the friendship between two guys that spans over many years." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8637440/","name":"The Climb","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDczYjkxYzMtMGM2Yy00MDg0LWIwZGQtMjYwZWEzNDFmMzY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the friendship between two guys that spans over many years.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8637440/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Friends ... how many others have them?","reviewBody":"Some friendships are quite special. Exhausting and terrible at times, but have worked for so many years that they may have developed a dangerous situation that both individuals may not be able to escape from ... but why would they want to you may ask? Is a great friend not everything you can ask for? Maybe and maybe not is the answer, I reckon.\n\nIn this case it is not just about friends, it is about what they do to each other and relationships outside their own one. Like with a life partner - not going to say they should share everything ... do not even think that. But you will see through family dysfunction and other oddities ... a low budget movie that can be quite engaging if you let it. Especially if you really roll with the flow of it and with the characters ... no matter how flawed they are .... and a movie that sort of almost ends like it begins ... with one friend not being able to control his emotions and ... well you'll see how others react to that! Not holding back "punches" - as I am not holding back on puns!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4044,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"male nudity,cyclist,reference to batman,ice fishing,ice fishing hut","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872464153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2MwNjYzOWYtOGJhMC00YmI5LTlkZGYtMDZiYmZhZmM4YWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2MwNjYzOWYtOGJhMC00YmI5LTlkZGYtMDZiYmZhZmM4YWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kyle and Mike are best friends who share a close bond ... until Mike sleeps with Kyle's fiancée."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5568803/","name":"Kyle Marvin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3511834/","name":"Michael Angelo Covino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4587360/","name":"Gayle Rankin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3511834/","name":"Michael Angelo Covino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0478896/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0742524/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251553/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3511834/","name":"Michael Angelo Covino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5568803/","name":"Kyle Marvin"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pornografia
Pornografia
programme.desc:
Pornografia: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Krzysztof Majchrzak, Adam Ferency, Krzysztof Globisz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska. Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0357037/","name":"Pornografia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNTY3ODE2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODMwNTQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0357037/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"scrypt@rcn.com"},"dateCreated":"2004-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ravishing attention to nuance; pity about the tone.","reviewBody":"Recently, I saw the film Pornografia at the Walter Reade Theater. This offering by Polish director Jan Kolski is an adaptation of Wiltold Gombrowicz's difficult novel, in which minute sensory information is invested with meaning and sutured into intricate causal patterns that reflect the protagonist's paranoia.

So much of the narrative takes place in the main character's head that I'd thought the story impossibly non-cinematic. Yet Kolski manages to bring in several levels of nuance and rarefied metaphor. What's more, said nuances become sensual and aesthetic. 

Unfortunately, what Kolski leaves out of the film is the tone of the book, which reads like Beckett's version of Dangerous Liaisons. The film feels too elegiac, too post-tragic, even overtly moralistic -- it's as if the director were trying to correct Gombrowicz's narrator's amoral tone. This change creates unintentional ambiguities, flaws that don't exist in the book: for example, it is unclear why the two main characters turn against one of younger characters in the story. In the film, the main characters seem too ethical, too sensitive, to behave as they do. In the novel, their cynicism and casual sadism are everywhere apparent.

In the theater, I perceived a number of Polish members of the audience to be weeping at key moments; it occurred to me that the loss of a son or daughter was so commonplace in that country at one time that the film might have had an indigenous impact -- one that a third- or second-generation American would miss without clarification. Thus I'm not ready to dismiss the film as unclear or sentimental without knowing more.

(For the record, neither the novel nor the film resembles Schindler's List; neither are about a concentration camp. And even if they were, Spielberg's melodrama is not the gold standard to which other holocaust films should be compared. Far earlier and better specimens exist, such as those by Louis Malle, Alain Resnais and Claude Lanzmann.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":933,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"2003-10-17","keywords":"sex standing up,lift skirt,panties hit the floor,panties pulled down,fondling","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538048/","name":"Krzysztof Majchrzak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272295/","name":"Adam Ferency"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322937/","name":"Krzysztof Globisz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094194/","name":"Luc Bondy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102722/","name":"Gérard Brach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326822/","name":"Witold Gombrowicz"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: O co biega?
programme.desc: W magazynie nowinki oraz praktyczne porady dla osób, które uprawiają bieganie rekreacyjnie, półprofesjonalnie, zawodowo lub dopiero zaczynają. Gospodarz programu Marcin Rosłoń wraz z ekspertami będzie podpowiadał, jak przygotować się do biegania amatorskiego i zawodowego, jak dobrać odpowiedni sprzęt lub przygotować się do maratonu. W programie nie zabraknie również ciekawostek, rozmów ze sportowcami i osobami z show-biznesu, które opowiedzą o swojej pasji do biegania.

credits.actor: Sienna Guillory, Brian Cox, Bruce Dern, Brandon Larracuente, John Bowe, Nicole Ansari-Cox, Ben Temple, Verónica Forqué, Anna Jobarteh
